column6:
This studio is in the amazing Bishop Arts Neighborhood and just 8 minutes from downtown Dallas. (Uber $6 to downtown, $8 to Deep Ellum)
Super comfy bed with luxurious linens. Tall ceilings and hardwood floors. Imagine staying within walking distance to many restaurants, shops and coffee houses. 
It's just a 4 minutes walk to the trolley that will take you to downtown Dallas. 
A delightful breakfast/lunch bakery is located across the street.
